column2:
"Excellent. Now I see why everyone's been
talking about you. You're the real deal."

"You may have amazing skills, but remaining
vigilant for the entire mission is just what
we at ARKS do."

"If you remember that and keep working
hard, your future will be so bright, you'll have
to wear shades!"

"Heh. That reminds me of this one time, in the
old days..."
